amendment.description: Amendment allows law-abiding residents of the District of Columbia to keep a registered handgun in their home.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 10 and printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to allow law-abiding residents of the District of Columbia to keep a handgun in the home.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 208, 3 Present (Roll no. 241).
